channel.title: Racing game - Epic crash/repair/re-crash
channel.description:
Figured this can be turned into a discussion, upon racing games you play that show damage, allow you to repair the car, etc. I recently downloaded 'Street Legal Racing Redline 2.2.1' and the 2.30LE patch (fixed many of the official bugs and such). I built a nice little car after several drag races in a beater, after a couple races I ended up flipping the new car around 320+MPH (was around 320, but I know it was over). This was the outcome: [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/2rhv4a9.png[/img]
After tons more drag-races in the beater (average of only $500 a piece) around the entire city, I repaired it back to a great state, and threw a nice little V10 in there (best I could offered). This is the outcome: [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/2q2iqyw.png[/img] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/2h3o51e.jpg[/img]
About 3 races, and a t-bone + sandwiched car later, I present to you, the all new sub-compact version! (Other cars I can drive fine with the V16 and drag slicks, etc. Just this one am prone to crash [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/2hwoaqx.png[/img]
So my question is to you, What are some games you play that show damage, and show us some of [b]your[/b] cars that got messed up.

item.title: Racing game - Epic crash/repair/re-crash
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

just cause 2 is awesome:)

item.title: Racing game - Epic crash/repair/re-crash
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:5, topic:394309”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=491495.msg3594865#msg3594865 date=1304979555]
Play ‘Just Cause 2’.
Going 300 mph then hitting a small bump, you flip like 500 times, and if u dont catch on fire or the car doesnt flip, you’re ok.
[/quote]
Ill look it up, although I would prefer a better challenge on actually having to worry about hitting even a lightpost.[/quote]

The game is just GTA on crack.
Steal a car, crash it at 300 mph, get a new one.
Steal a jet, crash it into the ground, it goes boom.

Read full topic

item.title: Racing game - Epic crash/repair/re-crash
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:2, topic:394309”]You’d expect the engine to explode after so much compression or something. Haha.

Gladly, we don’t drive that fast in reality and restricter plates are inside NASCAR engines.[/quote]
Built another car like it with a V16 in it. Topped out at 461MPH

Read full topic

I built a nice little car after several drag races in a beater, after a couple races I ended up flipping the new car around 320+MPH (was around 320, but I know it was over). This was the outcome:

After tons more drag-races in the beater (average of only $500 a piece) around the entire city, I repaired it back to a great state, and threw a nice little V10 in there (best I could offered). This is the outcome:
